title: marishque-mouse
text:
How to use
Set up mouse:

print('hi')

hi



mouse=Mouse(29,'Marishque')

Call the mouse:

mouse.call(10)

How old is the mouse?

title: Mouse core
text:
source

Mouse

 Mouse (age, name)

This is a cute mouse




Details




age
Age of the mouse


name
name of the mouse




source


Mouse.call

 Mouse.call (n:int=5)

Calls the cute Mouse n times

mouse=Mouse(29,'Marishque')


mouse2=Mouse(36,'Kolja')

How old is Mouse?

mouse.age

29



mouse2.age

36



mouse2.name

'Kolja'



source


test_normal_case

 test_normal_case ()


#Test
assert(mouse.age==29)


mouse.call(2)
